mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NO, A.EMAIL , A.NAME , A.POSITION, A.ADDRESS_1 , A.ADDRESS_2 , A.ZIP_CODE , A.PHONE_NUM , A.BIRTH_DATE , A.MARRIAGE_DATE , A.CAREER_DATE , A.ENTRY_DATE , A.SCHOOL_MAJOR , A.SCHOOL_CAREER , A.MOONCAL_YN , A.CERT_YN , A.MANAGER_YN , A.APPROVAL_YN , A.PHOTO_PATH , A.CERTFILE_JOB_PATH, A.CERTFILE_SCHOOL_PATH , A.UPD_DATE , A.RET_DATE , A.UPD_ID, A.NOTE , A.TEMP_COLUM , B.CODE_NAME FROM TB_MEMBER A INNER JOIN TB_CODE B WHERE A.POSITION = B.CODE_ID AND MEMBER_NO != '99999999' ORDER BY A.POSITION

SELECT A.*, B.CODE_NAME FROM ( SELECT MEMBER_NO, EMAIL, NAME, POSITION, ADDRESS_1, ADDRESS_2, ZIP_CODE, PHONE_NUM, BIRTH_DATE, MARRIAGE_DATE, CAREER_DATE, ENTRY_DATE, SCHOOL_MAJOR, SCHOOL_CAREER, MOONCAL_YN, CERT_YN, MANAGER_YN, APPROVAL_YN, PHOTO_PATH, CERTFILE_JOB_PATH, CERTFILE_SCHOOL_PATH, REG_DATETIME, REG_ID, RET_DATE, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{member_no} ) A INNER JOIN TB_CODE B WHERE A.POSITION = B.CODE_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER ( MEMBER_NO, EMAIL, PWD, NAME, POSITION, ADDRESS_1, ADDRESS_2, ZIP_CODE, PHONE_NUM, BIRTH_DATE, MARRIAGE_DATE, CAREER_DATE, ENTRY_DATE, SCHOOL_MAJOR, SCHOOL_CAREER, MOONCAL_YN, CERT_YN, MANAGER_YN, APPROVAL_YN, PHOTO_PATH, CERTFILE_JOB_PATH, CERTFILE_SCHOOL_PATH, REG_DATETIME, REG_ID, RET_DATE, NOTE, TEMP_COLUM ) VALUES ( #{member_no}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{position}, #{address_1}, #{address_2}, #{zip_code}, #{phone_num}, #{birth_date}, #{marriage_date}, #{career_date}, #{entry_date}, #{school_major}, #{school_career}, #{mooncal_yn}, #{cert_yn}, #{manager_yn}, #{approval_yn}, #{photo_path}, #{certfile_job_path}, #{certfile_school_path}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), #{reg_id}, #{ret_date}, #{note}, #{temp_colum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET EMAIL = #{email}, NAME = #{name}, POSITION = #{position}, ADDRESS_1 = #{address_1}, ADDRESS_2 = #{address_2}, ZIP_CODE = #{zip_code}, PHONE_NUM = #{phone_num}, BIRTH_DATE = #{birth_date}, MARRIAGE_DATE = #{marriage_date}, CAREER_DATE = #{career_date}, ENTRY_DATE = #{entry_date}, SCHOOL_MAJOR = #{school_major}, SCHOOL_CAREER = #{school_career}, MOONCAL_YN = #{mooncal_yn}, CERT_YN = #{cert_yn}, MANAGER_YN = #{manager_yn}, APPROVAL_YN = #{approval_yn}, PHOTO_PATH = #{photo_path}, CERTFILE_JOB_PATH = #{certfile_job_path}, CERTFILE_SCHOOL_PATH = #{certfile_school_path}, UPD_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), RET_DATE = #{ret_date}, UPD_ID = #{upd_id}, NOTE = #{note}, TEMP_COLUM = #{temp_colum} WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{member_no}

update.foreach: UPDATE TB_MEMBER SET RET_DATE=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{item}

mapper.select: SELECT A.NAME, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = A.POSITION) AS POSITION FROM ( SELECT NAME, POSITION FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE (BIRTH_DATE = #{solarDate} AND MOONCAL_YN = 0) OR (BIRTH_DATE = #{moonDate} AND MOONCAL_YN = 1) ) A
SELECT A.NAME, (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = A.POSITION) AS POSITION FROM ( SELECT NAME, POSITION FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MARRIAGE_DATE = #{solarDate} ) A
SELECT MAX(MEMBER_NO) FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO LIKE CONCAT(#{member_no}, '%')

SELECT IFNULL(MEMBER_NO, "") AS MEMBER_NO, IFNULL(EMAIL, "") AS EMAIL , IFNULL(NAME, "") AS NAME , IFNULL((SELECT CODE_NAME FROM TB_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = POSITION),"") AS POSITION, IFNULL(ADDRESS_1, "") AS ADDRESS_1 , IFNULL(ADDRESS_2, "") AS ADDRESS_2 , IFNULL(ZIP_CODE, "") AS ZIP_CODE , IFNULL(PHONE_NUM, "") AS PHONE_NUM , IFNULL(BIRTH_DATE, "") AS BIRTH_DATE , IFNULL(MARRIAGE_DATE, "") AS MARRIAGE_DATE , IFNULL(CAREER_DATE, "") AS CAREER_DATE , IFNULL(ENTRY_DATE, "") AS ENTRY_DATE , IFNULL(SCHOOL_MAJOR, "") AS SCHOOL_MAJOR , IFNULL(SCHOOL_CAREER, "") AS SCHOOL_CAREER , IFNULL(MOONCAL_YN, "") AS MOONCAL_YN , IFNULL(CERT_YN, "") AS CERT_YN , IFNULL(MANAGER_YN, "") AS MANAGER_YN , IFNULL(APPROVAL_YN, "") AS APPROVAL_YN , IFNULL(PHOTO_PATH, "") AS PHOTO_PATH , IFNULL(CERTFILE_JOB_PATH, "") AS CERTFILE_JOB_PATH, IFNULL(CERTFILE_SCHOOL_PATH, "") AS CERTFILE_SCHOOL_PATH , IFNULL(UPD_DATE, "") AS UPD_DATE , IFNULL(RET_DATE, "") AS RET_DATE , IFNULL(UPD_ID, "") AS UPD_ID, IFNULL(NOTE, "") AS NOTE , IFNULL(TEMP_COLUM, "") AS TEMP_COLUM FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO IN
#{item.member_no}
